text: Anthony Warren Shumaker (born 14 May 1973) is a former Major League Baseball pitcher. He was born in Tucson, Arizona. Shumaker played baseball while attending college at Cardinal Stritch University. He was drafted in the 23rd round of the 1995 Major League Baseball Draft by the Philadelphia Phillies. He played at the Major League level with the team in 1999. The following year, he was selected off waivers by the New York Mets and was later traded to the Baltimore Orioles for minor league player Juan Aracena. He would also be a member of the Chicago Cubs organization. ==References== Category:Sportspeople from Tucson, Arizona Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Cardinal Stritch Wolves baseball players Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Baseball players from Arizona Category:Atlantic City Surf players Category:Newark Bears players Category:Long Island Ducks players
title: Anthony Shumaker
